    1: <?php
    2:
    3: namespace Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Resource\Spec;
    4:
    5: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk AS Main;
    6: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Env AS Env;
    7: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\File AS File;
    8: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\File\Model\Yaml AS Yaml;
    9:
    10: const RC_DIR = '.rc';
    11:
    12: /** [testing] Check for enabled constant
    13: * @param String $property_name
    14: * @return Bool false || true
    15: */
    16: function Enabled(String $name) {
    17: $root = Env\Path('root');
    18: $rc = $root.'/spec/.testrc';
    19: if (is_dir(dirname($rc))
    20: && is_file($rc)
    21: ) {
    22: $c = Yaml\decode(file_get_contents($rc));
    23:
    24: return (property_exists($c, $name)
    25: && $c->$name == 'true'
    26: ) ? true : false;
    27: }
    28:
    29: return false;
    30: }
    31:
    32: /** [testing] Set alternate rc directory
    33: * @return false;
    34: */
    35: function SET_ALTERNATE_RC_DIR() {
    36: $dir = tempnam(Main\cwd(), RC_DIR);
    37: unlink($dir);
    38: mkdir($dir);
    39: Main\Set(Main\ALTERNATE_RC_DIR, $dir);
    40: return false;
    41: }
    42:
    43: /** [testing] Unset alternate rc directory
    44: * @return false;
    45: */
    46: function UNSET_ALTERNATE_RC_DIR() {
    47: $dir = Main\rc_directory_alt();
    48: if ($dir) {
    49: File\rmdir($dir);
    50: Main\Clear(Main\ALTERNATE_RC_DIR);
    51: }
    52: return false;
    53: }
